title: The Emperor's Return
plot: Brigadier Paoli, a former follower of Napoleon and at present commanding a detachment of the coastguard, is celebrating the betrothal of his daughter Annette to Marco the fisherman. Marco is late and appears to share a secret with a girl friend of Annette's. Annette notices this and sees him leave a note at the same girl's home on the following day. Annette reads the note, in which an appointment is made for a meeting at St. Elois Bay. The coastguards meanwhile receive a warning that Napoleon may land at the Coast of Var. This is Marco's secret. He wants to greet the Emperor and wishes the girl, whom Annette considers as her rival, to be there also. Annette follows them and is just about to stab the girl when Napoleon arrives. Annette's jealousy fades away and with the others she salutes him. Then the reason for the note dawns upon her and she is happily reunited to Marco.
